attributes.action: Alow EU National resident in the UK to VOTE in the EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: The European Union Referendum Bill should make it clear that the franchise will follow broadly the same rules as the local government elections in order to allow all other E.U. nationals residents in the UK for at least 3 years to vote in The European Union Referendum.
attributes.background: All other European Union Nationals over 18 who are resident in the UK for at least 3 years should have a say in The European Union Referendum.
